definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (perh. fr. above √)—a region beyond Jordan, N. or NE. of Gilead, prob. Aramean; [[אֶרֶץ טוֹב]] Ju Jdg 11:3, Jdg 11:5, LXX Twb; [[טוֹב אישׁ]] 2Sa 10:6, 2Sa 10:8 men of Ṭôb, LXX (E)idtwb; = Tou/bion, Tw/bion 1Ma 5:13; identif. by Conder:Handb. 295 with southern Bashan, where is still Taiyibeh, 12 m. SE. from Sea of Galilee.
